mapper.select: select rank, name,profile,readcnt,rcpcnt,followcnt from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY readcnt DESC) AS rank, m.*,r1.*,r2.*,f.* from member m, (select memnum, sum(readcount) as readcnt from rcp group by memnum) r1, (select memnum, count(*) as rcpcnt from rcp group by memnum)r2, (select follownum, count(*) as followcnt from follow group by follownum) f where m.memnum=r1.memnum and m.memnum=r2.memnum and m.memnum=f.follownum order by readcnt desc)

select rank, name,profile,readcnt,rcpcnt,followcnt from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY readcnt DESC) AS rank, m.*,r1.*,r2.*,f.* from member m, (select memnum, sum(readcount) as readcnt from rcp group by memnum) r1, (select memnum, count(*) as rcpcnt from rcp group by memnum)r2, (select follownum, count(*) as followcnt from follow group by follownum) f where m.memnum=r1.memnum and m.memnum=r2.memnum and m.memnum=f.follownum order by readcnt desc) where upper(name) like '%'||upper(#{keyword})||'%'
